018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.cleaner;
019
020import org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration;
021import org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path;
022import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseInterfaceAudience;
023import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.region.MasterRegionFactory;
024import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
025
026/**
027 * Master local storage HFile cleaner that uses the timestamp of the HFile to determine if it should
028 * be deleted. By default they are allowed to live for {@value #DEFAULT_TTL}
029 */
030@InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(HBaseInterfaceAudience.CONFIG)
031public class TimeToLiveMasterLocalStoreHFileCleaner extends BaseTimeToLiveFileCleaner {
032
033  public static final String TTL_CONF_KEY = "hbase.master.local.store.hfilecleaner.ttl";
034
035  // default ttl = 7 days
036  public static final long DEFAULT_TTL = 604_800_000L;
037
038  @Override
039  protected long getTtlMs(Configuration conf) {
040    return conf.getLong(TTL_CONF_KEY, DEFAULT_TTL);
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  protected boolean valiateFilename(Path file) {
045    return file.getName().endsWith(MasterRegionFactory.ARCHIVED_HFILE_SUFFIX);
046  }
047
048}
